Moo::FarPlaneConstant

Moo::FarPlaneConstant Class Reference

The FarPlane constant (fp, 1.f/fp, skyfp, 1.f/skyfp) The sky has a different, 'virtual' far plane to allow it to appear as though it's much bigger than the world. More...

bool operator() (ID3DXEffect *pEffect, D3DXHANDLE constantHandle)

Detailed Description

The FarPlane constant (fp, 1.f/fp, skyfp, 1.f/skyfp) The sky has a different, 'virtual' far plane to allow it to appear as though it's much bigger than the world.
